p: A database of 487 genome sequences isolated from patients infected with SARS-CoV-2 in Italy, Spain, Germany, France, UK, Sweden and USA has been randomly collected from the GISAID database, aligned and compared to the SARS-CoV-2 reference genome. A total of 27 genomes were considered in January 2020, 91 in February 2020, 210 in March 2020 and, finally, 159 genomes in April 2020. We analyzed 54 genome samples collected in Italy, 61 in Spain, 62 in Germany, 52 in France, 80 in UK, 50 in Sweden and 128 in the United States (TableÂ 2).
